nodes.text: 30 Years of Star Wars Radio Drama Part II: How the Empire Almost Won and the Jedi Never Returned

30 Years of Star Wars Radio Drama Part II: How the Empire Almost Won and the Jedi Never Returned is the second part of an article to commemorate the 30th anniversary of the Star Wars radio drama. The article was written by Michael Kogge and appeared in Star Wars Insider 128. It was later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2014.
